8.text: Here's a way to keep your drinks cool on the beach without using coolers

11.text:
or fridges. What you've got to do is... soak
the towel... completely. If you've got time

20.text: you can walk to the sea but...

21.text:
...I'm only here for a couple of days.
Right. With the towel wet you wrap that around

28.text:
your drink, like so, lie it on the sand - and
let the weather do the work.

38.text:
As the sun beats down on the towel some of
the water heats up enough that it turns into

44.text:
water vapour. As it evaporates it takes that
heat with it, leaving any less hot water

52.text:
molecules behind. So the towel gets progressively
colder. Cooling down my drink.

62.text: OK I think this should have worked by now.

71.text: And do you know what? It worked! That could be a lifesaver in certain circumstances.
